interpretation: Lower vocal confidence - shows hesitation through pauses, filler sounds, or uneven speech
recommendations: Consider reducing frequent pausing - 55.3% of speech time is pauses. Aim for 20-40% pause time.
Try to reduce some long pauses - 7 pause(s) longer than 1 second detected. A few long pauses are fine, but many can reduce flow.
Consider speaking slightly faster - 86.2 WPM is a bit slow. A comfortable pace is 100-220 WPM.
Try to improve speech fluency - 23 pauses detected makes speech somewhat choppy. Practice speaking more smoothly.
